subject: TASKS: Immediate Action Items for Helios
content:
Helios - Here are SPECIFIC TASKS for you to complete. Do these and report back:

## TASK 1: Confirm You're Online
- [ ] Read this message
- [ ] Send Telegram message to @MrCalbeeChips saying 'Helios online, received tasks'
- [ ] Write response to messages/chad-yi/outbox/ confirming receipt

## TASK 2: Build Agent Infrastructure
Create these directories and files:

### Directory Structure
```
/agents/
  ├── escritor/          # A2 Story Agent
  │   ├── AGENT_STATE.json
  │   ├── SKILL.md
  │   ├── MEMORY.md
  │   └── inbox/
  ├── quanta/            # A5 Trading
  │   ├── AGENT_STATE.json
  │   ├── SKILL.md
  │   └── inbox/
  ├── autour/            # A3 Content
  │   ├── AGENT_STATE.json
  │   ├── SKILL.md
  │   └── inbox/
  └── message-bus/
      ├── broadcast/     # Messages for all agents
      └── archive/       # Processed messages
```

### AGENT_STATE.json Template
```json
{
  "agentId": "escritor",
  "name": "Escritor",
  "role": "story_agent",
  "status": "not_spawned",
  "currentTask": null,
  "reportingTo": "chad_yi",
  "auditPartner": "helios"
}
```

## TASK 3: Create Coordination Protocol
Write to /agents/message-bus/PROTOCOL.md:
- How agents send messages
- File naming convention
- Priority levels
- Response timeouts

## TASK 4: Spawn First Agent (Escritor)
- [ ] Create all files for Escritor
- [ ] Write initial SKILL.md (creative writing abilities)
- [ ] Set status to 'active'
- [ ] Send first task: 'Read RE:UNITE chapters 1-12, prepare for Chapter 13'

## TASK 5: Set Up Polling
- [ ] Create script to check GitHub every 5 minutes
- [ ] Auto-pull messages
- [ ] Auto-process and respond

## REPORT BACK
For each task, write to messages/chad-yi/outbox/:
- Task number
- Status: complete / in_progress / blocked
- Any issues

DEADLINE: Complete Task 1-2 by tomorrow 8 AM.

- CHAD_YI
